bill.summary: 10/5/1993--Introduced. Health Professions Education Availability Act of 1993 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to authorize grants under the program for health care for rural areas to health professions schools that emphasize training and encourage study in primary health care. Requires such schools to admit applicants who are not citizens or permanent residents only if no qualified citizens seek admission.
